elements.description:
`lrnsys-progress-circle`
`circle that the outline grows as the percentage ticks up`

properties.name: value
properties.description: Current value.

properties.name: toolTip
properties.description: Whether to add a tooltip on hover.

properties.name: listView
properties.description: If this is in a list view, expand the output.

properties.name: icon
properties.description: Icon.

properties.name: iconComplete
properties.description: Special icon to use when the item has been completed.

properties.name: loadingIcon
properties.description: Loading icon

properties.name: finishedIcon
properties.description: Finished icon

properties.name: activeIcon
properties.description: Current value.

properties.name: step
properties.description: Array position within a larger body of items.

properties.name: active
properties.description: If this item is active or not in the larger list

properties.name: status
properties.description:
Status of the progression.
Possible values are disabled, loading, available, complete

properties.name: disabled
properties.description: Correctly disable the button if it's status is such.

properties.name: loading
properties.description: Calculate if something is in a loading status which invokes a swirl.

properties.name: finished
properties.description:
Boolean to invoke "finished" state. Useful for the last circle
in a series.

properties.name: max
properties.description: Max progression for doing math against.

properties.name: __chimed
properties.description: Internal property to ensure we only ding 1x

properties.name: __finishchimed
properties.description: Internal property to ensure we only finish 1x

properties.name: url
properties.description: URL to link to on click.

properties.name: dataUrl
properties.description: Data url to bubble up for more advanced implementations.

properties.name: strokeWidth
properties.description: Stroke width.

properties.name: focusState
properties.description:
Tracks if focus state is applied for element consistency
when dealing with focus vs hover states.

properties.name: playSound
properties.description:
Play sound status; if this should play sound
when it hits certain milestones or not.

properties.name: playFinishSound
properties.description:
Play sound at end; if this should play sound
when it hits certain milestones or not.

properties.name: completeSound
properties.description: Play sound on complete.

properties.name: finishedSound
properties.description: Play sound on complete.

properties.name: _bubbleProgress
properties.description: Fire and track milestones towards completion state.

methods.name: ready
methods.description: Ready state

methods.name: _testValueComplete
methods.description: Test if the value = max meaning that we hit complete from available

methods.name: focusEvent
methods.description: Focus event for UX consistency.

methods.name: focusOn
methods.description: Focus event for UX consistency.

methods.name: focusOff
methods.description: Focus event for UX consistency.

methods.name: tapEventOn
methods.description: Tapped on the item.

methods.name: _getActiveIcon
methods.description: Calculate which icon to present.

methods.name: _playSound
methods.description: Play the sound effect.

methods.name: _loadingStatus
methods.description: Calculate loading based on the status of the item.

methods.name: _finishedStatus
methods.description: Calculate loading based on the status of the item.

methods.name: _statusChange
methods.description: Notice when state changes to fire up an event for others to respond to.

methods.name: _disableStatus
methods.description: Calculate disable based on the status of the item.

attributes.description: Current value.

attributes.name: tool-tip
attributes.description: Whether to add a tooltip on hover.

attributes.name: list-view
attributes.description: If this is in a list view, expand the output.

attributes.name: icon
attributes.description: Icon.

attributes.name: icon-complete
attributes.description: Special icon to use when the item has been completed.

attributes.name: loading-icon
attributes.description: Loading icon

attributes.name: finished-icon

attributes.name: active-icon

attributes.name: step
attributes.description: Array position within a larger body of items.

attributes.name: active

attributes.description:
Status of the progression.
Possible values are disabled, loading, available, complete

attributes.name: disabled
attributes.description: Correctly disable the button if it's status is such.

attributes.name: loading
attributes.description: Calculate if something is in a loading status which invokes a swirl.

attributes.name: finished
attributes.description:
Boolean to invoke "finished" state. Useful for the last circle
in a series.

attributes.name: max
attributes.description: Max progression for doing math against.

attributes.name: url
attributes.description: URL to link to on click.

attributes.name: data-url
attributes.description: Data url to bubble up for more advanced implementations.

attributes.name: stroke-width
attributes.description: Stroke width.

attributes.name: focus-state
attributes.description:
Tracks if focus state is applied for element consistency
when dealing with focus vs hover states.

attributes.name: play-sound
attributes.description:
Play sound status; if this should play sound
when it hits certain milestones or not.

attributes.name: play-finish-sound
attributes.description:
Play sound at end; if this should play sound
when it hits certain milestones or not.

attributes.name: complete-sound
attributes.description: Play sound on complete.

attributes.name: finished-sound
attributes.description: Play sound on complete.

elements.description:
`lrnsys-progress`
`track progression as a circle and series of circles`

properties.name: disableAjaxCalls
properties.description: Disable internal ajax calls as something is handling them above.

properties.name: items
properties.description: Items to display to visualize the progression.

properties.name: sound
properties.description:
Play sounds whenever an item is complete.
This can get pretty annoying though unless the items
won't be completed for awhile.

properties.name: soundFinish
properties.description:
Play sound when the user finishes the progression. This
could also be annoying but far less so :)

properties.name: completeSound
properties.description: Play sound on complete.

properties.name: finishedSound
properties.description: Play sound on complete.

properties.name: title
properties.description: Title of this progression, primarily for accessibility.

properties.name: keyItems
properties.description:
Items displayed at specific points on the progression.
These aren't filled up but place points along the progression
which can help people see where they are relative to other
factors such as % complete as a tick mark or icon.

properties.name: active
properties.description: ID of the active item.

properties.name: progressiveUnlock
properties.description:
Whether to automatically make disabled items available
or not when the previous one was just complete.

properties.name: state
properties.description: State of progress in the current progression

properties.name: overallPercentage
properties.description: How far is the user through this series of items.

properties.name: _responseList
properties.description: Responses for each item.

properties.name: activeNodeResponse
properties.description: Active response from the node selected.

properties.name: nodeData
properties.description: Active response from the node selected.

properties.name: nodeDataError
properties.description: Error.

properties.name: vertical
properties.description: Flag to be vertical instead of horizontal.

properties.name: size
properties.description:
Size to make everything, small, medium, large, and epic
are available class names; default medium.

properties.name: strokeWidth
properties.description: Calculate width based on the size since we have to convert em to px.

methods.name: _getStrokeWidth
methods.description:
Set an appropriate stroke width based on size of the element.
This is because it's a hard pixel value when the rest of our
sizing is based on em's

methods.name: _reportState
methods.description:
Fire event that state has changed with what the statement is.
This gives a readable name to what the state is of the progress bar
as well as access to the full item that triggered the state change.

methods.name: _itemsChanged
methods.description:
Notice items have changed; only worry about if the count changes
though since other oberservers handle downstream mutation

methods.name: _isActive
methods.description: Simple boolean for whatever is active currently.

methods.name: _activeResponseChange
methods.description: Active Response changed; bubble it up.

methods.name: _bubbleUpChangeActive
methods.description:
Notice event from the nodes themselves
and set active based on a node bubbling up an event
that says "Hey I am active now!"

methods.name: _activeChanged
methods.description: Active item has changed, set the rest of the data to match.

methods.name: _statusChanged
methods.description: Listen for the state of anything below to change.

methods.name: handleNodeResponse
methods.description: Response returned from triggering the Node's URL to fire to get a response.

methods.name: _handleNodeError
methods.description: Weak support for error code being found

methods.name: _overallPercentageCompute
methods.description:
Calculate the overall percentage competed.
This forms the line that's connecting the steps.

methods.name: changePercentage
methods.description: Change the percentage for the active item.

methods.name: updateItems
methods.description: Modify items and update template binding correctly.
